name: Kodi
description: Kodi is a cross-platform media center software with various network media protocols supported. It can play almost all popular audio and video formats as well as online medias.

en_US.description: Kodi is a cross-platform media center software with various network media protocols supported. It can play almost all popular audio and video formats as well as online medias.
en_US.name: Kodi

zh_CN.description: Kodi是一个跨平台媒体中心软件，它能够播放几乎所有流行的音频和视频格式，还可以用于播放网络媒体，支持各种网络媒体协议等。
zh_CN.name: Kodi
